comments:
200404131323

There are some references to org.eclipse.ui.handlers.WidgetMethodHandler in
org.eclipse.ui's plugin.xml, but the only WidgetMethodHandler I can find comes
from org.eclipse.ui.internal.commands.ws.

Anyway, this seems to be causing ClassNotFoundExceptions when pressing Ctrl-C
and Ctrl-V in text fields in the Breakpoint properties dialog.

Chris moved these classes while trying to clean up the API, but it looks like 
he didn't update the XML.  Updated in HEAD.
